reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really nice place, good dinner. Obviously had a recent refurbishment, shame they didn't add in a lift or at least a less cumbersome staircase. The town is basically just a stopover place so the quality of hotel was important. Apart from the staircase, the only other criticism is that the lounge area was too small to have after dinner drinks for more than one couple or group.
reviews.title: Good hotel
Nice staying!!
reviews.text: We spent one night here, the hotel is on several levels without a lift, so can be quite disappointing if you have heavy luggage.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was small but clean and with the tv and tea facilities. There was a beautiful view from the window!!
reviews.title: Tired and expensive

reviews.text: There's also a restaurant in the hotel, quite expensive but good and you can check the prices on the menu at the check in, so if you prefer a cheaper option you can go to fast food in Egilsstadir.
reviews.title: Excellent Place
